Metadata.Title: CVE-2021-20270 affecting package python-pygments for versions less than 2.7.4-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2021-20270 affecting package python-pygments for versions less than 2.7.4-1. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package python-pygments is earlier than 2.7.4-1, affected by CVE-2021-20270
